verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: the wildcard] [ARGM-TMP: when it comes to the potential summit between him and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a geopolitics expert] .
President Donald Trump is the wildcard [ARGM-TMP: when] it [V: comes] [ARG1: to the potential summit between him and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , according to a geopolitics expert .
President Donald Trump is the wildcard when it comes to the potential summit between him and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , [V: according] to a geopolitics expert .
